verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said ( Restrictions against the Unclean) יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr ...,

דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> dab·bêr “ Tell אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- ... אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- ... בָּנָ֗יו <WH1121> bā·nāw and his sons וְיִנָּֽזְרוּ֙ <WH5144> wə·yin·nā·zə·rū to treat with respect מִקָּדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6944> miq·qā·ḏə·šê the sacred offerings בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- that the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō so that they do not יְחַלְּל֖וּ <WH2490> yə·ḥal·lə·lū profane אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> šêm name. קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> qāḏ·šî My holy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer הֵ֧ם <WH1992> hêm - מַקְדִּשִׁ֛ים <WH6942> maq·di·šîm have consecrated to Me לִ֖י Prep│1cs ( lî) , אֲנִ֥י 589 Pro-1cs ( ’ă·nî) I יְהוָֽה׃ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) am the LORD.

אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> ’ĕ·mōr Tell אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem them [that] לְדֹרֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1755> lə·ḏō·rō·ṯê·ḵem for the generations to come, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- if any אִ֣ישׁ׀ <WH376> ’îš - אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- יִקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> yiq·raḇ approaches מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik·kāl - זַרְעֲכֶ֗ם <WH2233> zar·‘ă·ḵem of [their] descendants אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... הַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> haq·qo·ḏā·šîm the sacred offerings אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that יַקְדִּ֤ישׁוּ <WH6942> yaq·dî·šū consecrate בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, וְטֻמְאָת֖וֹ <WH2932> wə·ṭum·’ā·ṯōw in a state of uncleanness עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw ... וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <WH3772> wə·niḵ·rə·ṯāh must be cut off הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> han·ne·p̄eš person הַהִ֛וא <WH1931> ha·hi·w that מִלְּפָנַ֖י <WH6440> mil·lə·p̄ā·nay from My presence. אֲנִ֥י <WH589> ’ă·nî I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh am the LORD.

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš ... אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> ’îš ... מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> miz·ze·ra‘ If a descendant אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn of Aaron וְה֤וּא <WH1931> wə·hū ... צָר֙וּעַ֙ <WH6879> ṣā·rū·a‘ has a skin disease ( Forms of the Hebrew tzaraath, traditionally translated as leprosy, were used for various skin diseases; see .) א֣וֹ <WH176> ’ōw or זָ֔ב <WH2100> zāḇ a discharge, בַּקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> baq·qo·ḏā·šîm the sacred offerings לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō ... יֹאכַ֔ל <WH398> yō·ḵal he may not eat עַ֖ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ until אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יִטְהָ֑ר <WH2891> yiṭ·hār he is clean. וְהַנֹּגֵ֙עַ֙ <WH5060> wə·han·nō·ḡê·a‘ Whoever touches בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl anything טְמֵא־ <WH2931> ṭə·mê- defiled נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> ne·p̄eš by a corpse א֣וֹ <WH176> ’ōw or אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ’îš by a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- who תֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> tê·ṣê has מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mim·men·nū שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> šiḵ·ḇaṯ- an emission זָֽרַע׃ <WH2233> zā·ra‘ of semen,

אוֹ־ <WH176> ’ōw- or אִישׁ֙ <WH376> ’îš whoever אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יִגַּ֔ע <WH5060> yig·ga‘ touches בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl a שֶׁ֖רֶץ <WH8318> še·reṣ crawling creature אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יִטְמָא־ <WH2930> yiṭ·mā- - ל֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) א֤וֹ 176 Conj ( ’ōw) or בְאָדָם֙ 120 Prep-b│N-ms ( ḇə·’ā·ḏām) a person אֲשֶׁ֣ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) that יִטְמָא־ 2930 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yiṭ·mā-) makes him unclean ל֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) , לְכֹ֖ל 3605 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḵōl) whatever טֻמְאָתֽוֹ׃ 2932 N-fsc│3ms ( ṭum·’ā·ṯōw) the uncleanness may be —

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <WH5315> ne·p̄eš the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who תִּגַּע־ <WH5060> tig·ga‘- touches בּ֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) any of these וְטָמְאָ֖ה 2930 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3fs ( wə·ṭā·mə·’āh) will remain unclean עַד־ 5704 Prep ( ‘aḏ-) until הָעָ֑רֶב 6153 Art│N-ms ( hā·‘ā·reḇ) evening. וְלֹ֤א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) He must not יֹאכַל֙ 398 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yō·ḵal) eat מִן־ 4480 Prep ( min-) from הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים 6944 Art│N-mp ( haq·qo·ḏā·šîm) the sacred offerings כִּ֛י 3588 Conj ( kî) unless אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) ... רָחַ֥ץ 7364 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( rā·ḥaṣ) he has bathed בְּשָׂר֖וֹ 1320 N-msc│3ms ( bə·śā·rōw) himself בַּמָּֽיִם׃ 4325 Prep-b, Art│N-mp ( bam·mā·yim) with water.

וּבָ֥א <WH935> ū·ḇā has set, הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> haš·še·meš When the sun וְטָהֵ֑ר <WH2891> wə·ṭā·hêr he will become clean, וְאַחַר֙ <WH310> wə·’a·ḥar and then יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> yō·ḵal he may eat מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים <WH6944> haq·qo·ḏā·šîm the sacred offerings, כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî for לַחְמ֖וֹ <WH3899> laḥ·mōw are his food. הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> hū they

נְבֵלָ֧ה <WH5038> nə·ḇê·lāh anything found dead וּטְרֵפָ֛ה <WH2966> ū·ṭə·rê·p̄āh or torn by wild animals, לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō He must not יֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> yō·ḵal eat לְטָמְאָה־ <WH2930> lə·ṭā·mə·’āh- which would make him unclean בָ֑הּ Prep│3fs ( ḇāh) . אֲנִ֖י 589 Pro-1cs ( ’ă·nî) I יְהוָֽה׃ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) am the LORD.

וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> wə·šā·mə·rū [The priests] must keep אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֗י <WH4931> miš·mar·tî My charge, וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- lest יִשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> yiś·’ū they bear עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw - חֵ֔טְא <WH2399> ḥêṭ the guilt וּמֵ֥תוּ <WH4191> ū·mê·ṯū and die ב֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( ḇōw) כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) because יְחַלְּלֻ֑הוּ 2490 V-Piel-Imperf-3mp│3ms ( yə·ḥal·lə·lu·hū) they profane it. אֲנִ֥י 589 Pro-1cs ( ’ă·nî) I יְהוָ֖ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) am the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ 6942 V-Piel-Prtcpl-msc│3mp ( mə·qad·də·šām) who sanctifies them.

וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl one זָ֖ר <WH2114> zār outside [a priest’s family] לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- No יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> yō·ḵal may eat קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš the sacred offering, תּוֹשַׁ֥ב <WH8453> tō·wō·šaḇ may the guest כֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> kō·hên of a priest וְשָׂכִ֖יר <WH7916> wə·śā·ḵîr or his hired hand לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- nor יֹ֥אכַל <WH398> yō·ḵal eat קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš [it].

וְכֹהֵ֗ן <WH3548> wə·ḵō·hên a priest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- But if יִקְנֶ֥ה <WH7069> yiq·neh buys נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> ne·p̄eš a slave קִנְיַ֣ן <WH7075> qin·yan with כַּסְפּ֔וֹ <WH3701> kas·pōw his own money, ה֖וּא <WH1931> hū that [slave] יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> yō·ḵal may eat בּ֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) וִילִ֣יד 3211 Conj-w│N-msc ( wî·lîḏ) is born בֵּית֔וֹ 1004 N-msc│3ms ( bê·ṯōw) in his household, הֵ֖ם 1992 Pro-3mp ( hêm) or if [a slave] יֹאכְל֥וּ 398 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( yō·ḵə·lū) - בְלַחְמֽוֹ׃ 3899 Prep-b│N-msc│3ms ( ḇə·laḥ·mōw) his food.

וּבַת־ <WH1323> ū·ḇaṯ- daughter כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> kō·hên the priest’s כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî If תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> ṯih·yeh is married לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> lə·’îš to a man זָ֑ר <WH2114> zār other [than a priest], הִ֕וא <WH1931> hî she בִּתְרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> biṯ·rū·maṯ contributions. הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> haq·qo·ḏā·šîm of the sacred לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō is not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> ṯō·ḵêl to eat

וּבַת־ <WH1323> ū·ḇaṯ- daughter כֹּהֵן֩ <WH3548> kō·hên a priest’s כִּ֨י <WH3588> kî But if תִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> ṯih·yeh becomes אַלְמָנָ֣ה <WH490> ’al·mā·nāh widowed וּגְרוּשָׁ֗ה <WH1644> ū·ḡə·rū·šāh or divorced וְזֶרַע֮ <WH2233> wə·ze·ra‘ children אֵ֣ין <WH369> ’ên with no לָהּ֒ Prep│3fs ( lāh) - וְשָׁבָ֞ה 7725 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3fs ( wə·šā·ḇāh) and returns אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) to בֵּ֤ית 1004 N-msc ( bêṯ) house, אָבִ֙יהָ֙ 1 N-msc│3fs ( ’ā·ḇî·hā) her father’s כִּנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ 5271 Prep-k│N-mpc│3fs ( kin·‘ū·re·hā) as in her youth. מִלֶּ֥חֶם 3899 Prep-m│N-msc ( mil·le·ḥem) food אָבִ֖יהָ 1 N-msc│3fs ( ’ā·ḇî·hā) her father’s תֹּאכֵ֑ל 398 V-Qal-Imperf-3fs ( tō·ḵêl) she may share וְכָל־ 3605 Conj-w│N-msc ( wə·ḵāl) But no זָ֖ר 2114 Adj-ms ( zār) outsider לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) ... יֹ֥אכַל 398 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yō·ḵal) may share בּֽוֹ׃ס Prep│3ms ( bōw) it.

וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> wə·’îš anyone כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- If יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> yō·ḵal eats קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš a sacred offering בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <WH7684> biš·ḡā·ḡāh in error, וְיָסַ֤ף <WH3254> wə·yā·sap̄ he must add חֲמִֽשִׁיתוֹ֙ <WH2549> ḥă·mi·šî·ṯōw a fifth עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw to וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> wə·nā·ṯan its value and give לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> lak·kō·hên to the priest אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- -. הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> haq·qō·ḏeš the sacred offering

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō The priests must not יְחַלְּל֔וּ <WH2490> yə·ḥal·lə·lū profane אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - קָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> qā·ḏə·šê the sacred offerings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê [that] the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... אֵ֥ת <WH853> ’êṯ - אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - יָרִ֖ימוּ <WH7311> yā·rî·mū present לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD

וְהִשִּׂ֤יאוּ <WH5375> wə·hiś·śî·’ū and thus to bear אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām - עֲוֺ֣ן <WH5771> ‘ă·wōn the punishment אַשְׁמָ֔ה <WH819> ’aš·māh for guilt. בְּאָכְלָ֖ם <WH398> bə·’ā·ḵə·lām by allowing the people to eat אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - קָדְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <WH6944> qā·ḏə·šê·hem the sacred offerings כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî For אֲנִ֥י <WH589> ’ă·nî I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh am the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃פ <WH6942> mə·qad·də·šām who sanctifies them. ”
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said ( Worthy Offerings) יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr ...,
